column3:
Nature Love
ewline
ewlineYolanda loves nature. She loves trees, flowers, grass, singing birds, the sky, and even the wind. She spends a lot of time lying on the grass, looking at the sky, and listening to the birds.
ewline
ewlineOne of Yolanda's favorite things to do is to look at the shapes of the big, fluffy clouds. "That one looks like a flower. And that one looks like a boat. There's one that looks like my dog!" she says to herself. She is always surprised and happy to find a new shape.
ewline
ewlineYolanda's most favorite thing to do is to look at the flowers and bugs that visit her place. She watches and studies all the butterflies, bees, ants, spiders, and even worms that are in her backyard.
ewline
ewlineYolanda has a wonderful backyard. Her mother has a big, beautiful garden that she helps to take care of. This is how Yolanda is learning to grow and take care of plants. The garden makes the whole yard look beautiful and smell wonderful. And the garden brings in all kinds of amazing birds and insects.
ewline
ewlineYolanda has lots of pictures of the birds and bugs that come into her backyard. She feels like a kid scientist. Someday, she wants to become a real scientist. Then she can learn all about plants, bugs and nature.
column4: one: What is one of Yolanda's favorite things to do?
column5: To look at the shapes of dogs.
column6: To look at the shapes of boats.
column7: To look at the shapes of backyards.
column8: To look at the shapes of the clouds.
column9: one: Which shapes did Yolanda see in the clouds?
column14: multiple: What does Yolanda want to become someday and why?
column15: A real scientist, so she can learn all about building houses and backyards.
column16: A real scientist, so she can study medicine.
column17: A real scientist, so she can learn all about plants, bugs and nature.
column18: A gardener, so she can learn all about plants, bugs and nature.
column19: multiple: What does the backyard garden do?
column21: Makes shapes like flowers, boats, and dogs.
column23: Makes the yard look beautiful, smell wonderful, brings in birds and insects.
